title: Federal judge orders stop to "indiscriminate" ICE raids in Los Angeles
summary: Federal Judge Maame Ewusi-Mensah Frimpong ordered the Trump administration to stop immigration sweeps in southern California, citing "a mountain of evidence" that agents were arresting people solely based on race, accents, or type of work. The ruling represents a significant judicial pushback against the administration's aggressive enforcement tactics.
actors: U.S. District Court Central District of California
